isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1995) - ENGINE CONTROL SYSTEM OVERVIEW - VEHICLE FEATURES (STANDARD) - ENGINE CRANK INHIBIT

svcproc.title: ENGINE CRANK INHIBIT
svcproc.para: This system will not allow the engine to crank unless the automatic transmission is in neutral and will not allow the starter to engage while the engine is running. It also facilitates the use of cruise control and Power Take-Off (PTO) options with automatic transmissions. Engine Crank Inhibit is available as an optional feature with a manual transmission and a clutch switch.
